summary: All 20 backend API tests passed for new bulk link features. Tested POST /api/auth/link-notepads (bulk link endpoint), verified authenticated notepad creation with proper user_id linking and account_type=user, and confirmed all existing endpoints continue to work.

minor.issue: passlib.handlers.bcrypt warning about bcrypt version (cosmetic, does not affect functionality)

critical_code_review_comments: POST /api/auth/link-notepads endpoint correctly handles: 401 without auth, non-existent codes (skips), already-linked notepads (skips), notepads belonging to other users (skips)
Authenticated notepad creation correctly sets user_id and account_type=user with ~365 days expiration
Guest notepad creation correctly sets user_id=null and account_type=guest with ~90 days expiration
Bulk link response structure includes linked_count, skipped_count, linked array, and skipped array with reasons
seed_data_creation: Created multiple test users with TEST_bulk_ prefix and guest/user notepads during test execution
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 2 tested new bulk link features. Test file /app/backend/tests/test_bulk_link_features.py covers: bulk link without auth (401), bulk link non-existent codes, bulk link multiple guest notepads, bulk link already-linked notepads, bulk link mixed codes, bulk link notepad belonging to another user, bulk link empty array, guest notepad creation verification, authenticated notepad creation verification, GET user notepads after bulk link, single link still works, existing auth endpoints (register, login, /me), existing notepad CRUD, and web pages. Combined with iteration_1 tests, all Phase 3 auth features and new bulk link features are thoroughly tested.
tests_passed: POST /api/auth/link-notepads - handles non-existent codes gracefully (skips with reason 'not found')
POST /api/auth/link-notepads - successfully bulk links multiple guest notepads to user
POST /api/auth/link-notepads - handles mixed codes (valid guest, already linked, non-existent)
POST /api/auth/link-notepads - skips notepads belonging to another user (reason 'belongs to another user')
POST /api/notepad (authenticated) - user_id set, account_type=user, ~365 days expiration
